channel.title: Infos on Angela Reynoso
channel.description: Recent content in Infos on Angela Reynoso

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m Angela, a Senior Designer based in New York City. I am passionate about the work that I do: I dream about it, research it and create it. I am constantly learning, growing and keeping in touch with the latest design trends out there. If you need help with UI and web design, branding and identity, or graphics and illustrations, get in touch with me!

item.title: Contact
item.description: Keep in touch! Write me an e-mail, find me on LinkedIn or check out my Instagram feed.
